meanings.definition: The quality of being opportune or timely.
meanings.sent1: Her opportuneness in arriving just as the party started made her the center of attention.
meanings.sent2: The opportuneness of the rain during the drought saved the crops.
meanings.sent3: His opportuneness in always finding the best deals earned him the nickname 'Discount Dave'.
meanings.sent4: The opportuneness of her idea to start a food delivery service in the pandemic was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The cat's opportuneness in catching the mouse amazed everyone in the house.

meanings.definition: The state of being advantageous or favorable.
meanings.sent1: The team's opportuneness in scoring the winning goal secured their victory.
meanings.sent2: The opportuneness of having a friend who is a doctor came in handy when she got sick.
meanings.sent3: The opportuneness of finding a $20 bill on the sidewalk made his day.
meanings.sent4: The opportuneness of the sunny weather for the outdoor wedding was a blessing.
meanings.sent5: The student's opportuneness in sitting next to the teacher helped him get extra help with the assignment.

meanings.definition: The suitability or convenience of a particular time or situation.
meanings.sent1: The opportuneness of the bus arriving right when she needed it was perfect.
meanings.sent2: His opportuneness in asking for a raise when the company was doing well paid off.
meanings.sent3: The opportuneness of the ice cream truck showing up just as the kids finished playing was uncanny.
meanings.sent4: The opportuneness of her finding her lost keys in her coat pocket was a relief.
meanings.sent5: The opportuneness of the wifi signal being strong during the online meeting was crucial for her presentation.
